title: The Gossip Monster
description: The Gossip Monster tells the story of a young girl who spreads rumors about a boy in her class and how she becomes remorseful as the rumors grow larger and more unrecognizable over time. Her teacher helps her understand the gravity of her actions and encourages her to set things straight. Illustrations support the text.
meta: assumptions, conclusion, consequences, deployed, expelled, glimpse, gossiping, humiliating, mutates, respect, rumor, sheepishly, slunk, sulking
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Cause and Effect : Understand and identify cause-and-effect relationships
Subject-Verb Agreement : Understand subject and verb agreement
Suffixes : Recognize suffix -ed and understand the formation of past-tense verbs

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
